sentences.sContent: This Gothic cathedral has attracted visitors from all around the world .
sentences.sContent_eng: This Gothic cathedral has attracted visitors from all around the world .
sentences.sCn: 这座哥特式的大教堂吸引了世界各地的游客。

sentences.sContent: Rosie gray is the one and only person , if it had not been for her , this crystal cathedral would not be here.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rosie gray is the one and only person , if it had not been for her , this crystal cathedral would not be here.
sentences.sCn: 她就是那一位，唯一的一人若没有她，水晶宫大教堂不会存在，这事工永远不会展开。

remMethod.val: cathedra(拉丁文： 主教座位) + l → 设有主教座位的地方 → 大教堂

trans.tranOther: the main church of a particular area under the control of a  bishop
